languages.text: {n}Сержант разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Эх, был бы здесь сержант Давиан из Терциума... может, и отбитый наглухо, но если бы с вами его отпустил — ничего бы с вами не случилось, хоть бы до самого губернатора пешком шли".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сержант разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Эх, был бы здесь сержант Давиан из Терциума... может, и отбитый наглухо, но если бы с вами его отпустил — ничего бы с вами не случилось, хоть бы до самого губернатора пешком шли".

languages.text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."
languages.original_text: {n}Сержант разочарованно качает головой.{/n} "Эх, был бы здесь сержант Давиан из Терциума... может, и отбитый наглухо, но если бы с вами его отпустил — ничего бы с вами не случилось, хоть бы до самого губернатора пешком шли".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... he may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could've walked all the way to the governor's palace without coming to any harm."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... he may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could've walked all the way to the governor's palace without coming to any harm."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

{n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant schüttelt enttäuscht den Kopf.{/n} "Ah, wäre doch nur Sergeant Davian von Tertium hier ... Er mag zwar völlig den Verstand verloren haben, aber hätte ich ihn Euch zur Seite gestellt, hättet Ihr unbehelligt zum Palast des Gouverneurs gehen können."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant schüttelt enttäuscht den Kopf.{/n} "Ah, wäre doch nur Sergeant Davian von Tertium hier ... Er mag zwar völlig den Verstand verloren haben, aber hätte ich ihn Euch zur Seite gestellt, hättet Ihr unbehelligt zum Palast des Gouverneurs gehen können."

languages.text: {n}Le sergent secoue la tête avec regret.{/n} « Ah, si seulement Davian était là... Ce sergent de Tertium a peut-être complètement perdu la boule, mais avec lui à vos côtés, vous auriez pu marcher jusqu'au palais du gouverneur sans risquer le moindre mal. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent secoue la tête avec regret.{/n} « Ah, si seulement Davian était là... Ce sergent de Tertium a peut-être complètement perdu la boule, mais avec lui à vos côtés, vous auriez pu marcher jusqu'au palais du gouverneur sans risquer le moindre mal. »

languages.text: {n}軍曹は残念そうに首を振る。{/n}「あぁ、ティルティウムのダビアン軍曹がここにおられたら…彼は完全に気が狂ってしまったかもしれないが、彼をあなたに帯同させることができたら、総督の宮殿まで何の危険もなく歩いて行けたことでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹は残念そうに首を振る。{/n}「あぁ、ティルティウムのダヴィアン軍曹がここにおられたら…彼は完全に気が狂ってしまったかもしれないが、彼をあなたに帯同させることができたら、総督の宮殿まで何の危険もなく歩いて行けたことでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Çavuş, hüsranla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ah Tertiumlu Çavuş Davian burada olacaktı ki... Birkaç tahtası eksiktir meksiktir ama size o eşlik ediyor olsaydı burnunuz bile kanamadan ta valinin sarayına kadar ulaştırırdı sizi."
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuş, hüsranla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Ah Tertiumlu Çavuş Davian burada olacaktı ki... Birkaç tahtası eksiktir meksiktir ama size o eşlik ediyor olsaydı burnunuz bile kanamadan ta valinin sarayına kadar ulaştırırdı sizi."

languages.text: {n}El sargento niega con la cabeza, decepcionado.{/n} «Ah, si estuviera aquí el sargento Davian de Tertium... Habrá perdido la cabeza, pero si le hubiera dejado acompañarle habría llegado hasta el palacio del gobernador sin sufrir daño alguno».
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento niega con la cabeza, decepcionado.{/n} «Ah, si estuviera aquí el sargento Davian de Tertium... Habrá perdido la cabeza, pero si le hubiera dejado acompañarle habría llegado hasta el palacio del gobernador sin sufrir daño alguno».

languages.text: {n}军士失望地摇了摇头。{/n}“啊，要是特提恩的达维安军士也在这里就好了……他可能确实是个彻头彻尾的疯子，但只要有他陪在您身边，您就可以一路安然无恙抵达总督府，不会受到任何伤害。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant shakes his head in disappointment.{/n} "Ah, if only Sergeant Davian of Tertium was here... He may have completely lost his marbles, but if I'd let him accompany you, you could have walked all the way to the governor's palace without any harm befalling you."

traits.locale_text: {n}军士失望地摇了摇头。{/n}“啊，要是特提恩的达维安军士也在这里就好了……他可能确实是个彻头彻尾的疯子，但只要有他陪在您身边，您就可以一路安然无恙抵达总督府，不会受到任何伤害。”
